description: This is a short hike of about 1.2km on a dirt road.  Then the flagging tape to your left is easy to follow to some very nice exposed granite and lots of climbing routes.
directions: Highway 357 north of Musquodoboit Harbour and park at the gated dirt road at; N44 50.251 W63 12.006.  the rock face is at; N44 50.246 W63 12.972
title: Columbus Wall
